citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 14:45 - 15:15 on
31July2023. Local law enforcement accompanied inspector to premises. No one on premises and no one responded to
attempted contact. Two chained pitbull dogs present at front of residence and much barking could be heard coming from
behind the home. Inspector called registrant by phone (14:45), received text that he would call back in a minute, but he
did not call back. Inspector called again at conclusion of 30 minute wait period (15:15) - no answer. Inspector left a phone
message stating that an attempted inspection was conducted today.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 14:45 - 15:15 on 
31July2023. Local law enforcement accompanied inspector to premises. No one on premises and no one responded to 
attempted contact. Two chained pitbull dogs present at front of residence and much barking could be heard coming from 
behind the home. Inspector called registrant by phone (14:45), received text that he would call back in a minute, but he 
did not call back. Inspector called again at conclusion of 30 minute wait period (15:15) - no answer. Inspector left a phone 
message stating that an attempted inspection was conducted today. 
 
 
End Section
